title: maNamalar pOlE
sahitya:
maNamalar pOlE nI vAzhvAyE manamE mangaLa nAyakan tangat-tiruvaDikkE


anupallavi

  kaNam irundAlum adan guNamuLLa punnakai kATTum vaNDirkku virundUTTum aruNOdaya


caraNam    parama shAntamAna marak-kiLaiyilE pUttE bhakti makarandattaip-parugi nidam pazhuttE
turiya shivAnandam soTTum rasam shezhittE toNDarellAm parugak-kaNDu kaNDu kaLittE
